itemDescription: British artist, author, educator and broadcaster

wikipedia_page.main: Ann Sutton  (born 16 May 1935) is a British artist, author, educator and broadcaster. She gained international recognition as an innovative textile artist and designer from the 1950s and has continued to develop her making and research in other media to the present day.She was appointed Member of the Order of the British Empire (MBE) in 1991 and Officer of the Order of the British Empire (OBE) in the 2022 New Year Honours for services to the arts. She was made a Senior Fellow of the Royal College of Art and a Visiting Professor at the University of the Arts, both in 2005.

response: *Ann Sutton (born 1935), artist, author, educator and broadcaster.
*Professor Ann Sutton, MBE. For services to the Arts.
